casebody.data:
Joyce THURLOW, Personal Representative of the Estate of Kenneth Thurlow, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
WILLIAM BEAUMONT HOSPITAL and Todd Singleton, CRNA, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Michael Sikorsky, D.O., and American Anesthesiology of Michigan, P.C., Defendants. SC: 158787
COA: 343817 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 24, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
